short_description: Selects columns that match any of the given names in a vector
Selects columns that match all the given names in a vector
Selects columns whose names start with a specified prefix
Selects columns whose names end with a specified suffix
Selects columns whose names contain a specified string
Selects columns whose names match a specified regular expression
Selects specified columns from a data frame
Selects rows with the smallest values of a variable
Selects rows with the largest values of a variable
